title: A Very Merry Iconic Podcast - JINGLE ALL THE WAY (1996)
itunes:title: A Very Merry Iconic Podcast - JINGLE ALL THE WAY (1996)
itunes:subtitle: Danny and Jenna dive into Jingle All The Way, the Arnold/Sinbad/Rita Wilson holiday extravaganza. They also touch on Family Stone, Home Alone, and the animatronic reindeer that populated 90s holiday movies.FOR MORE ICONIC CHRISTMAS MOVIE RECAPS, VIS...
description:
Danny and Jenna dive into Jingle All The Way, the Arnold/Sinbad/Rita Wilson holiday extravaganza. They also touch on Family Stone, Home Alone, and the animatronic reindeer that populated 90s holiday movies.


FOR MORE ICONIC CHRISTMAS MOVIE RECAPS, VISIT THE "A VERY MERRY ICONIC PODCAST" FEED.

VISIT MINT MOBILE AT www.mintmobile.com/MERRYICONIC

*To support this pod & access bonus episodes, visit Patreon.com/EverythingIconic
